bridge_functions.name: Callssms.OpenPhoneDialer
bridge_functions.description: Open the native phone dialer with a pre-filled number and optional auto-call

bridge_functions.name: Callssms.OpenSms
bridge_functions.description: Open the native SMS composer with a pre-filled recipient and message body

bridge_functions.name: Callssms.OpenWhatsapp
bridge_functions.description: Open WhatsApp with a pre-filled number in message or call mode

bridge_functions.name: Callssms.PickContact
bridge_functions.description: Open the contact picker to select a phone number (device or WhatsApp contacts)

bridge_functions.name: Callssms.RequestPermissions
bridge_functions.description: Request all required runtime permissions (CALL_PHONE, READ_CONTACTS). Exits the app if denied.

info_plist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Access your contacts to quickly pre-fill phone numbers for calls and messages.
